alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:20PM MDT until June 26 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SCOTTS BLUFF...NORTHWESTERN BANNER...SOUTHEASTERN GOSHEN AND NORTHEASTERN LARAMIE COUNTIES... At 719 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over La Grange, or 32 miles south of Torrington, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Hawk Springs Recreation Area and Hawk Springs Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
